page.title: 08ALLINGTON WOOD
page.content: Allington Wood is a small area of coniferous and deciduous{woodland} administered by the Forestry Commission. The area is rich in wildlife and at the time we visited, some parts of the{landscape}were carpeted with bluebells. Close to the centre of the wood there is a reservoir owned by Portsmouth Water Company. The reservoir was opened in 1981. Water is taken from the River Itchen and, for{health} reasons, cleaned and purified and pumped to Wickham 9 miles away. Each week the water is tested for bacteria and it is found that{poliomyelitis}is still present in the river.
